title: [Large-Scale] Online Scientific Inquiry: Critical Thinking and Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A course for general citizens to strengthen scientific literacy, providing asynchronous learning environments accessible via mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners will perform critical analysis on scientific topics presented in online discussions
Learners will collaborate with peers to write blog posts outlining scientific problem-solving solutions
Learners will provide peer feedback in three or more formats using digital platforms
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
